data.eml:eml: New species of the plesiomorphic genus Nixonia Masner (Hymenoptera: Platygastroidea, Platygastridae) from South Africa.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article van Noort, S., Johnson, N. F. (2009): New species of the plesiomorphic genus Nixonia Masner (Hymenoptera: Platygastroidea, Platygastridae) from South Africa. ZooKeys 20: 31-51, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/22843/22843.pdf
